max_number_of_files_to_load.comment: Set to -1 to load all data

image_height.comment: Height of an image in the dataset

image_width.comment: Width of an image in the dataset

number_of_channels_in_image.comment: Number of channels in an image file. Change to 4 for RGBA

number_of_output_classes.comment: Number of multilabel classes that can have more than 1 class set to 1

batch_size.comment: Size of a batch for training

tensorboard_log_directory.comment: Directory from which TensorBoard reads training stats to visualize
